    • Uses of Coords in bship.logic

      Methods in bship.logic that return Coords 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coords Coords.down()
      Returns the coords of the bottom adjacent cell of this instance of coords.
      Coords Ship.getInitCoords()
      Returns the initial coords where the ship is placed on the map, i. e., the coords of the first cell that belongs to this Ship.
      Coords ShipPlacement.getShipInitCoords(java.lang.String shipName) 
      Coords Coords.left()
      Returns the coords of the left adjacent cell of this instance of coords.
      Coords Coords.randomAdjacentCell()
      Generates a random cell (or point) in the 2D space that is adjacent to the coords that this object represents.
      Coords Coords.right()
      Returns the coords of the right adjacent cell of this instance of coords.
      Coords Coords.up()
      Returns the coords of the upper adjacent cell of this instance of coords.

      Returns and ArrayList of Coords that represent the coords around a ship.

      void Coords.Set(Coords coords)
      Sets the coords of this instance of Coords (i. e. the x and y coords (abcissa and ordinate)) to be equal to the Coords object it receives as parameter.
